commit message:
Merge branch 'master' into text_select

Conflicts:
res/values/strings.xml
src/net/nightwhistler/pageturner/activity/ReadingFragment.java
src/net/nightwhistler/pageturner/view/bookview/BookView.java
src/net/nightwhistler/pageturner/view/bookview/FixedPagesStrategy.java
src/net/nightwhistler/pageturner/view/bookview/TextSelectionActions.java

First working version of highlights.

Still very basic, you can set a highlight and it will be there
as long as the app runs.
No longer crashes on page number calculation.
Book-specific settings are now saved in a seperate config file.
Can now create highlights, and they change colour on click.
Can now delete and re-colour highlights.
Some UI changes to note editing.
Text selection now closes on back button.
Nicer display of progress, including pages.
Fix to deal with updated epub-lib
Small changes to bring prefs more in line with UI guidelines.
Added simple DrawerLayout to the ReadingActivity.
Directly injecting ClipboardManager broke app on Android < 3

Merge pull request #429 from waffleio/master

waffle.io Badge
Added preferences to disable CSS colours.

Merge branch 'master' into drawer_layout

Conflicts:
res/values/strings.xml
Removed reference to resorce that's not available on Android 2.x
Fixed layout so we no longer crash on landscape catalog.

Should fix text selection mode being triggered on the first tap after
load.

Disabled dragging the navigation drawer.

It conflicted with other motion-based controls like swiping and dragging
the progress bar.
Fix to deal with updated epub-lib
Now uses stable 0.4 version of HtmlSpanner
Should now be able to actually open books again :)
Downloads can now run in the notification area.
Also let failure message be removed by clicking.
Added call to requestFocus again to prevent selection mode.
Edge tapping no longer triggers selection mode.
Removing as many calls to getActivity() as possible.
Added option to restore old app-open behaviour.
Hides status bar on focus change
TOC is now in the drawer
Added error when TTS synth fails.
TTS should not be in the action bar
Clear task queue before starting manual import
Gave TOC its own menu item
fix an error about android-maven-plugin not finding aapt
add option in settings to change the sync server url
changed some inputTypes for a better user experience
Can now better handle bad search definitions

Merge pull request #456 from greggoryhz/master

fix an error about android-maven-plugin not finding aapt
add option in settings to change the sync server url

Merge pull request #458 from greggoryhz/operation-edittext

changed some inputTypes for a better user experience
Master branch should simply have 'dev' as version number

Caught all exceptions when calculating pagenumbers.

We just log the error and retry the next time the book is opened.

Partial work on fixing #463.

It works for the library and the downloads, but not during reading.
Improved handling of the back button.
ZipAlign works with the new Maven plugin version now.
Fixed quirk in back button handling.
Updated README to reflect the need for Maven 3.0
Slightly smarter handling of file browsing
Better feedback when a book can't be opened.
Now also uses ZipFile for resourceLoading. Fixes #466
Let the dialog swallow key events to prevent beeps
Implemented action-mode for clicking on highlights.

Add fragment for adding bookmarks

The logic for actually adding bookmarks is not yet present, but I'll get
to that
Add menu item for adding bookmarks
Provide the page number to the add bookmark dialog
Accept index/position instead of page number
bookmarks: Hook add button up to events
bookmarks: Fix up bookmark table column names

Title-page has page-num 0 again.

This is a fix for a bug introduced in
9dc75038618786d9e4ae64b84a8f6ce7cff2d075
Small fix to make it compile
Moved strings to the correct section.
Code formatting, and added Apache license headers
Booksmarks are now displayed in the navigation bar.
Changed query ordering to position in book
Added support for long-click on nav bar items
Now proposes the first line of the page as the bookmark title.
Now uses the default cancel / add buttons
Can now also highlight on Android 2.x
Removed libraryservice from singleton-scope for now.
